mapper.insert: insert into review values(NVL((select max(num) from review),0)+1, #{m_id}, #{title}, #{contents}, sysdate, 0,NVL((select max(num) from review),0)+1, 0,0,#{score}, #{id},'review')
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum r, t.* from (select * from review where p_id=#{id} order by ref desc, step asc) t) where r between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
mapper.update: update review set hit=hit+1 where num=#{num}
